alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 12 at 12:30AM CST until January 12 at 12:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL LONOKE AND EAST CENTRAL PULASKI COUNTIES... At 1229 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Geyer Springs, or over Southwest Little Rock, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... Argenta... Protho Junction... Sweet Home... Lakewood... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... Levy... McAlmont... State Fairgrounds... Scott... Otter Creek... Baseline... Baucum... Park Hill... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
